metadata.title: CVE-2024-3209 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in UPX up to 4.2.2. It has been rated ascritical. This issue affects the function get_ne64 of the file bele.h. Themanipulation leads to heap-based buffer overflow. The exploit has beendisclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-259055. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early aboutthis disclosure but did not respond in any way.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
